name: DescendInverse
description:
Ever wondered what a falling ball can look like? Probably not. But nevertheless! Get ready for this awesome new endless arcade game that is full of surprises!

the game in line is descending down as the name, you are a ball that need to stay in camera borders by descending down and avoiding going up with the tiles try to jump from tile to another, show me your best score ; )

The game is completely free and for all platforms and ages!

check out the screenshots below to get an idea of how the game functions! And don't forget to read the tips in loading screens

Have Fun ;)
